item.text: YI severe classification other than severe dehydration

valueCoding.display: Movement only when stimulated but then stops
Moves on his or her own or moves spontaneously or without stimulation

item.text: When did the Jaundice first appear?

valueCoding.display: Within less than 24 hours of birth
Skin Pinch goes back very slowly (More than 2 seconds)
Skin Pinch goes back slowly (2 seconds or fewer, but not immediately)

item.text: Breastfed how many times in 24 hours?
Young Infant receives food or fluids other than breast milk
What milk is being given as a replacement feed?
How many replacement feeds during the day and night (24 hours)?
How much milk is given at each feed?
How are the feeding utensils cleaned?
Do you give any breastmilk at all?
Ulcers or White Patches in Mouth
Unable to check if Ulcers or White Patches in Mouth

Count the number of breaths the child takes per minute to determine if fast breathing is present. To count the breaths per minute, use a watch with a second hand or a digital watch (or click here for a 60 second timer).  Look for the breathing movement anywhere on the child’s chest or abdomen.  The number of breaths for ‘fast breathing’ depends on the child’s age.  – Under 2 months: More than 60 breaths per minute* – 2 to 11 months: More than 50 breaths per minute – 12 to 59 months: More than 40 breaths per minute  *In young infants, a second measurement should be taken to confirm, unless there is already another sign of possible serious bacterial infection

valueCoding.display: Unable to perform Respiratory Rate at this time

valueExpression.expression: %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='AgeInMonths').answer.first().value < 2 and %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='Respiratory Rate profile').answer.first().value > 60 '{Counts}/min' and   %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='Respiratory Rate Second Count Profile').answer.first().empty()

valueCoding.display: Respiratory Rate Second Count Not Possible

valueExpression.expression: iif(%resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='Fast Breathing profile').answer.first().empty() and (%resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='AgeInMonths').answer.first().value >= 2 or %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='second').repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B22.DE04').answer.first().exists() ),iif((%resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='AgeInMonths').answer.first().value<2 and %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='second').repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B22.DE04').answer.first().value >= 60 '{Counts}/min'or%resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B22.DE01').answer.first().value >= 50 '{Counts}/min' and %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='AgeInMonths').answer.first().value < 12or %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B22.DE01').answer.first().value >= 40 '{Counts}/min' and %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='AgeInMonths').answer.first().value>=12 and %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='AgeInMonths').answer.first().value < 60), true, false),{})

item.text: For 12 months to 5 years fast breathing is 40 breaths per minute or more
